headline: A Fresh Look at Hershey’s (HSY) Valuation Following Mixed Q3 Results and Guidance Update
summary: Hershey (HSY) caught investor attention after sharing its third quarter financial results. The report highlighted a solid rise in sales along with a sharp drop in net income and earnings per share from the prior year. See our latest analysis for Hershey. Hershey has faced a string of mixed headlines lately, including another steady dividend and a small bump to full-year sales guidance, but those have not been enough to lift sentiment. After a challenging third quarter and with the share price...
